Scenes.VoiceOverText: What if I tell you that there is a mysterious civilization on our planet where the most advanced beings of our race dwell?
Scenes.Text: What if I tell you that there is a mysterious civilization on our planet where the most advanced beings of our race dwell?

Scenes.VoiceOverText: The name of this civilization is mentioned in various ancient writings all over the world
Scenes.Text: The name of this civilization is mentioned in various ancient writings all over the world

Scenes.VoiceOverText: Many have gone in search for this civilization and some have never returned the name of that place where this civilization
Scenes.Text: Many have gone in search for this civilization and some have never returned the name of that place where this civilization

Scenes.VoiceOverText: Exists is Shambhalla or the city of peace there exist multiple ancient maps which claim to guide you to Shambhalla
Scenes.Text: Exists is Shambhalla or the city of peace there exist multiple ancient maps which claim to guide you to Shambhalla

Scenes.VoiceOverText: But to decode these cryptic maps a person has to be well developed both mentally
Scenes.Text: But to decode these cryptic maps a person has to be well developed both mentally

Scenes.VoiceOverText: and spiritually many sources say that this city might be located in the Himalayan region or beneath the earth and point to the North Pole as its entrance
Scenes.Text: and spiritually many sources say that this city might be located in the Himalayan region or beneath the earth and point to the North Pole as its entrance

Scenes.VoiceOverText: But looking from a spiritual perspective the ancient documents of Hinduism and Buddhism claim that this city exists altogether in a different dimension
Scenes.Text: But looking from a spiritual perspective the ancient documents of Hinduism and Buddhism claim that this city exists altogether in a different dimension

Scenes.VoiceOverText: Which can only be accessed by powerful spiritual beings. So what do you think? Does this city really exist?
Scenes.Text: Which can only be accessed by powerful spiritual beings. So what do you think? Does this city really exist?
